name: Deep cleansing
description: A thorough cleansing using steam, exfoliation, and extraction to remove impurities and unclog pores.

name: Anti-aging
description: Focuses on reducing fine lines, wrinkles, and improving skin elasticity using specialized serums, masks, and treatments.

name: Microdermabrasion
description: Mechanical exfoliation technique to remove dead skin cells, revealing smoother and more even-toned skin.

name: Microcurrent
description: Using low-level electrical currents to stimulate facial muscles, aiming to tighten and tone the skin.

name: Basic manicure
description: Includes nail shaping, cuticle care, hand massage, and polish.

name: Gel manicure
description: Involves longer-lasting gel polish cured with UV or LED light.

name: Basic pedicure
description: Includes nail shaping, cuticle care, foot soak, massage, and polish.

name: Spa pedicure
description: Offers additional treatments like exfoliation, mask, and longer massage.

name: Deep Tissue Massage
description: Focuses on deeper layers of muscles and connective tissue to address chronic pain or tension. It involves more pressure and targeted techniques.

name: Aromatherapy Massage
description: Uses essential oils to enhance the massage experience and promote relaxation or address specific concerns like stress or insomnia.

name: Reflexology
description: Involves applying pressure to specific points on the feet, hands, or ears to stimulate corresponding organs and systems in the body.

name: Swedish Massage
description: A gentle, relaxing massage using long strokes, kneading, and circular movements to promote relaxation and alleviate muscle tension.

name: Waxing
description: Involves applying warm wax to the skin and then removing it along with the hair.

name: Sugaring
description: Uses a sticky paste made from sugar, lemon, and water to remove hair.

name: Laser Hair Removal
description: Utilizes laser technology to target hair follicles and inhibit hair growth over multiple sessions.

name: Electrolysis
description: Involves the use of electric currents to destroy individual hair follicles permanently.

name: Basic make-up
description: Minimalistic and natural make-up to highlight your true beauty.

name: Electrolysis
description: Extravagant make-up that shows the wild side of you. Perfect for a ball or other big events.
